CDIFF_RESULT_TEXT: RESULT: ** POSITIVE ** Clostridium difficile antigen PRESENT Clostridium difficile toxin PRESENT --------------------------------------------------- ** CONTACT PRECAUTIONS ARE REQUIRED. ** Due to persistent shedding of toxin, repeat testing of Clostridium difficile toxin positive patients is not indicated within 14 days of a positive test. --------------------------------------------------- **Patients with shock, ileus and/or megacolon due to C. difficile should  be **IMMEDIATELY** started on IV metronidazole AND oral vancomycin (AND  vancomycin enema if ileus present). Surgery and Infectious Diseases  consultations should be strongly considered. **For the complete adult UM C. difficile treatment guidelines visit the  Antibiotic Stewardship website, by copying the URL below and pasting  into a new browser window. --------------------------------------------------- http://tinyurl.com/kyzrsxe

RESULT:  **POSITIVE** Clostridium difficile Toxin B Gene PRESENT Clostridium difficile Antigen PRESENT Clostridium difficile Toxin B DNA DETECTED BY PCR ------------------------------------------------------------ **CONTACT PRECAUTIONS ARE REQUIRED** Due to persistant shedding of toxin, repeat testing of Clostridium difficile toxin positive patients is not  indicated within 14 days of a positive test. --------------------------------------------------- **Patients with shock, ileus and/or megacolon due to C. difficile should  be **IMMEDIATELY** started on IV metronidazole AND oral vancomycin (AND  vancomycin enema if ileus present). RESULT: ** POSITIVE ** Clostridium difficile antigen PRESENT Clostridium difficile toxin PRESENT --------------------------------------------------- ** CONTACT PRECAUTIONS ARE REQUIRED. ** Due to persistent shedding of toxin, repeat testing of Clostridium difficile toxin positive patients is not indicated within 14 days of a positive test. --------------------------------------------------- **Patients with shock, ileus and/or megacolon due to C. difficile should  be **IMMEDIATELY** started on IV metronidazole AND oral vancomycin (AND  vancomycin enema if ileus present). RESULT:  **POSITIVE** Clostridium difficile Toxin B Gene PRESENT Clostridium difficile Antigen PRESENT Clostridium difficile Toxin B DNA DETECTED BY PCR ------------------------------------------------------------ **CONTACT PRECAUTIONS ARE REQUIRED** Due to persistant shedding of toxin, repeat testing of Clostridium difficile toxin positive patients is not  indicated within 14 days of a positive test. --------------------------------------------------- **Patients with shock, ileus and/or megacolon due to C. difficile should  be **IMMEDIATELY** started on IV metronidazole AND oral vancomycin (AND  vancomycin enema if ileus present). RESULT:  **POSITIVE** Clostridium difficile Toxin B Gene PRESENT Clostridium difficile Antigen PRESENT Clostridium difficile Toxin B DNA DETECTED BY PCR ------------------------------------------------------------ **CONTACT PRECAUTIONS ARE REQUIRED** Due to persistant shedding of toxin, repeat testing of Clostridium difficile toxin positive patients is not  indicated within 14 days of a positive test. --------------------------------------------------- **Patients with shock, ileus and/or megacolon due to C. difficile should  be **IMMEDIATELY** started on IV metronidazole AND oral vancomycin (AND  vancomycin enema if ileus present).
